text:
Champions League
Real Madrid: Rodrygo ignites for Benzema!
Author of a hat-trick and a decisive pass, the Brazilian winger Rodrygo returned to his performance before renting that of his teammate in attack, Karim Benzema.
07 Nov 2019, 07:20 by Charlie Creteur



In front of Galatasaray, Real Madrid was intractable at home in this fourth day of the Champions League (6-0). A victory on a river score where Rodrygo scored a hat-trick before delivering a decisive pass at just 18 years old. "I am very happy," he said. "Every day, I go a little faster than expected, but I always say that I train and prepare myself so that it is not so new and that I am calm with that".




"Everything is easier with Benzema"




Karim Benzema + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

The Brazilian also paid tribute to his teammate Karim Benzema tricolor, author of a doubled. "Everything is easier with him," he continued. "It's a crack, a 10 who plays on the 9th. I'm very happy to play with him". A connection between the two players that could improve in the coming days!
